qas.question: How do linguists view Catalan and Valencian?
How do Valencian scholars view Catalan and Valencian?
What is the official regulating body of  Valencian?
Who says that there is linguistic unity between Catalan and Valencian?

context: Linguists, including Valencian scholars, deal with Catalan and Valencian <a0_0><a1_0>as the same language<a1_0/><a0_0/>. The official regulating body of the language of the Valencian Community, <a2_0>the <a3_0>Valencian Academy of Language<a3_0/><a2_0/> (Acadèmia Valenciana de la Llengua, AVL) declares the linguistic unity between Valencian and Catalan varieties.
